1221.question: Which soft-selection approaches are evaluated?
1221.response: {'Answer': 'In the paper, the authors use three soft-selection approaches: (1) \u201cBERT-Soft\u201d directly applies a softmax function to the logits of the last-layer hidden states of BERT; (2) \u201cBERT-Hard\u201d uses argmax to obtain the predicted label and then applies a softmax function to get the probability distribution; (3) \u201cBERT-Hard-Soft\u201d is similar to \u201cBERT-Hard\u201d, but it applies a softmax function to the logits before argmax.'}
